Name: Wreck it! VR
About the game: Wreck it! VR is a rage-room simulator with but one goal: supply you with the weapons and tools you need to DESTROY EVERYTHING IN SIGHT! Everyone knows how satisfying it is to release your frustrations on innocent inanimate objects. Who said therapy had to be boring?? 'You never know what a joy it is to SMASH, SMASH, SMASH' - Carrie Nation Compatible with all PC-linked VR headsets Create your own tools and weapons in-game and upload them to Steam Workshop 3 distinct scenarios to smash through Almost everything is destructible!
